name: euppapi
description: Custom API for EUPP Data Inventories
author: Reto Stauffer

scripts.css:build: node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/euppapi_bootstrap.scss css/euppapi_bootstrap.css
scripts.css:all: npm run css:build && npm run css:minify
